commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Okay, everyone! It's time once again for the "Let's Make Rinari Laugh Tournament!"

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: The crowd goes wild.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh, ho! Looks like Rinari's in a good mood today!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: S-So this is what Rina looks like when she's in a good mood. Got it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: This is like a daily ritual now.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm the one who asked them to do it.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Thanks to the Rina-chan Board that Ai helped me make, my friends can tell how I'm feeling.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: But now that I'm a school idol, I want people to know how I'm feeling—without the Rina-chan Board. I want to show them.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That's what this training's all about! And today, I have a very special joke prepared! Are you ready for this?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "Tense."

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Did you hear about the shoemaker? He was heeling from a broken heart when he ran into his solemate! They started off on the wrong foot, but they really are the perfect pair.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "Hehe."

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: *Groan* High praise from the Rina-chan Board, but Rinari's face hasn't changed at all.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hehe... Oops, sorry. That was a good one. Ahaha!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Man, of course it's a huge hit with you! Grrr, Rinari's a tough nut to crack. Tag in, Ayumu!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What? Me?! I-I'm not good at comedy.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Huh? Really?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: My mind always goes blank. I can't do this! No way!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You don't have to think about it so hard. I want to hear one of your jokes, too.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Groan* This is humiliating.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'll give it a shot, then! Umm...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Do you like my wool sweater?
Not baaa-d, right?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Not sure about that one.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?! R-Really? I thought it was just as good as Ai's puns.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: For real?! I'm like a master craftsman and you're... What's so funny, Ayumu?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Laugh* Sorry, sorry.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You agree, don't you, Ayumu? I thought my pun was pretty original.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hmm, I guess original is one way to put it. But, well, how do I put this gently?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I guess I can give it a try.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's the spirit, Ayumu! I don't want to be the only one making a fool of myself.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "Woo-hoo!"

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Umm, uhh, err...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Th-The brightest day of the week is Sun-day.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: N-Nope, this is too embarrassing!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Please say something!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* It was better than mine!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: A pun of this quality on your first try?! Looks like I've got myself a rival now.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Really? Hee, hee. What did you think, Rina? Was it funny?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "All smiles." This is fun, Ayumu. Thank you. Love you.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Umm. Ehehe. *Giggle* Really? Hee hee. If I think of any more, I'll tell them to you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's great that you tried it, Ayumu!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah! It was actually really fun!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Giggle* This is your first step towards becoming a master of puns.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's not really one of my goals.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Right. Sorry. But challenging yourself to try new things is fun, isn't it?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I see what you mean. Yeah, it really was!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu, when it comes to trying new things, you always start off making excuses, but in the end, you give it your best shot. I've always thought that that's one of your most amazing qualities.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's why you were the first person I asked to become a school idol.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: R-Really? I guess I never thought of myself that way.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Well, I think you're good at giving people a push when they need it. You're really suited to head our club! Way to go, Chief!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: C-Cut it out.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You'd actually make a great chief too, Ai. You know how to make things fun for everyone.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah, you brighten up the whole room!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I-It's because my forehead is so huge! It sparkles like the sun! Look, Rinari. Bright, right?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Ai, your forehead is round and nicely shaped.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That's why so much light reflects off of it! *Laugh*

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I think it's cute how you show off your forehead. Maybe I should try wearing my hair like that, too.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Me too.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That means you have to, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* I guess we'll be the forehead quartet!
